name: kyw-website-beta
description: Know Your Worth (KYW) - Beta Website (Password Protected)

scripts.encrypt: npx staticrypt src/pages/index.html src/pages/big-idea.html src/pages/investors.html src/pages/v1.html src/pages/v2.html src/pages/v3.html src/pages/v4.html src/pages/v5.html src/pages/v6.html src/pages/v7.html src/pages/v8.html src/pages/v9.html src/pages/v10.html src/pages/v11.html src/pages/v12.html src/pages/v13.html src/pages/v14.html src/pages/v15.html src/pages/v16.html src/pages/v17.html src/pages/v18.html -p partners-counts-string-walls --short -d . --template-title "Know Your Worth - Beta" --remember 30 -t password_template.html
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run encrypt

author: zipperloo
